meanings.definition: A nonessential amino acid that is a constituent of most proteins.
meanings.sent1: The body can produce serine on its own.
meanings.sent2: Proteins in our body contain serine.
meanings.sent3: Serine decided to join the protein party without an invitation.
meanings.sent4: In the web of proteins, serine is a crucial thread.
meanings.sent5: Imagine serine as a tiny building block holding proteins together.
